snippet: Bernard B. Kerik, who was once New York’s police commissioner, testified for the prosecution in a perjury trial against Frank and Peter DiTommaso in a Bronx court.
abstract: Former New York City Police Commissioner Bernard B Kerik testifies for the prosecution in a perjury trial against Frank and Peter DiTommaso in a Bronx court; testimony is the first time that  Kerik has had to explain under oath the actions that led to his own guilty pleas on federal tax fraud charges.
lead_paragraph: Bernard B. Kerik, who was once New York’s police commissioner, testified for the prosecution in a perjury trial against Frank and Peter DiTommaso in a Bronx court.

headline.seo: Ex-Police Commissioner Kerik Testifies in Perjury Trial
headline.main: Ex-Leader of Police Takes Stand, With Tears
headline.print_headline: With Tears, Kerik Testifies in Perjury Case
